overview: From 2025-10-19 to 2025-10-26, elizaos-plugins/plugin-solana had 1 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

topPRs.title: improvements, type fixes, items from PR9
topPRs.author: odilitime
topPRs.body:
<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
> [!NOTE]
> Refactors plugin config/init and Solana service, adds Token-2022 metadata parsing and batch utilities, updates docs/env and dependencies.
> 
> - **Core/Service**:
>   - Add Token-2022 metadata support (inline and pointer) with batch symbol/supply/decimals retrieval and improved caching.
>   - New utilities: `verifySignature`, `isValidAddress`, batch helpers (`getAddressesTypes`, `getCirculatingSupplies`, `getDecimals`, `getTokenAccountsByKeypairs`).
>   - Refactor Jupiter integration (async service load), account subscriptions, and `unsubscribeFromAccount` (now removes listener).
>   - Enhance `parseTokenAccounts` output (symbol, supply, tokenProgram, isMutable), safer math, and logging.
> - **Plugin Init**:
>   - Require `SOLANA_RPC_URL`; optional action registration via `SOLANA_NO_ACTIONS`.
>   - Register provider/actions dynamically; register chain on `INTEL_CHAIN`.
> - **Config/Env**:
>   - Replace `WALLET_*` with `SOLANA_*` keys in schema; relax some required fields; validation now reads from runtime settings.
>   - Add `env.example` and ignore local env/db files.
> - **Docs/Deps/Build**:
>   - Rename package usage to `@elizaos/plugin-solana` in README.
>   - Bump deps and add `@solana/spl-token-metadata`; update TypeScript/tsup; add declarationDir and test excludes.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit e93026c3b2ab695b2ca2dbef679e7bff9ca7c8e8. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->



<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Batch token utilities (decimals, circulating supply, token accounts, address-type detection), improved token metadata parsing, and a modernized signature verification API; safer startup behavior and optional action registration.

* **Documentation**
  * Plugin name corrected and an env.example added with Solana configuration guidance and example values.

* **Chores**
  * Dependency updates, TypeScript build config refinement, and updated .gitignore to exclude local env/database files.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: fix: update build script to use Bun.build directly
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary
Fixed build script that was failing due to non-existent build-utils import.

## Changes
- Replace non-existent build-utils import with direct Bun.build API
- Match plugin-openai build pattern for consistency
- Add @types/node for Node.js type definitions (Buffer, process, etc.)
- Remove unused tsup dependency and configuration
- Update tsconfig.build.json to fix TypeScript declaration generation
- Bump version to 1.2.5

## Testing
✅ Build now completes successfully in ~1.4s
✅ Generates ESM bundle and TypeScript declarations
✅ All output files created in dist/ folder

## Before
Build failed with: `Cannot find module '../../build-utils'`

## After
Build completes successfully with proper output

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Replaces tsup with a Bun-based build script that generates ESM and TypeScript declarations, updates TS configs and dependencies, and bumps the package to 1.2.5.
> 
> - **Build/Tooling**:
>   - Replace `build.ts` to use `Bun.build` with externals auto-derived from `package.json`, clean `dist`, and produce ESM+sourcemaps; run `tsc` for `.d.ts`.
>   - Remove `tsup` and delete `tsup.config.ts`; update `dev` script to `bun --hot build.ts`.
> - **TypeScript**:
>   - `tsconfig.build.json`: enable declaration output/maps, `skipLibCheck`, `lib: ESNext`, and `types: node`.
>   - `tsconfig.json`: include both `bun` and `node` types; include `build.ts`.
> - **Dependencies**:
>   - Bump `@solana/spl-token` to `0.4.14`; add `@solana/spl-token-metadata`.
>   - Add `@types/bun`, `@types/node`; bump `typescript`.
> - **Package**:
>   - Add `types: dist/index.d.ts`; version bump to `1.2.5`.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 99bdc9b17d88f7f7751ecd13ac07a45130aa3360. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Switched the project build to a Bun-based programmatic flow (replaces prior bundler configuration).
  * Bumped package version to 1.2.5 and updated development dependencies.
  * Updated developer workflow to use Bun hot-reload, added published type declarations, and adjusted TypeScript build settings.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
